question_1.description: I received sufficient preparatory information prior to my placement(s)

question_2.description: I was allocated placement(s) suitable for my course

question_3.description: I received appropriate supervision on placement(s)

question_4.description: I was given opportunities to meet my required practice learning outcomes/competences

question_5.description: My contribution during placement(s) as part of a clinical team was valued

question_6.description: My practice supervisor(s) understood how my placement(s) related to the broader requirements of my course
